articles.content: If youre in the market for a new gaming monitor, one of the early decisions you need to make is whether to buy a flat or curved display. The two formats offer different advantages and frequently mean… [+1783 chars]

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Google opens the door for Android apps that work across all kinds of devices - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s new cross-device software development kit (SDK) is supposed to make it easier for developers to make Android apps connect across a range of devices, including phones, tablets, cars, TVs, and more.
articles.content:
Paving the way for multi-device connectivity
Illustration by William Joel / The Verge
